special_powers.name: THE NOSE KNOWS, BUB
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 3 squares can't use Stealth or Shape Change.

special_powers.name: C'MERE SUGAH!
special_powers.description: Steal Energy, but only if Rogue hasn't been moved or placed this turn.

special_powers.name: A ROSE BY ANY OTHER NAME
special_powers.description: Perplex, but only to target other characters. When Beast uses it, if the target shares a keyword with him, you may instead modify the value except damage +2 or -2.

special_powers.name: APPEAR AS PART OF THE BACKGROUND
special_powers.description: Stealth. If Assassin's Guild is adjacent to hindering terrain and it's not your turn, lines of fire drawn to it are blocked.

special_powers.name: WE'RE ALL FOR PEACEFUL REHABILITATION HERE
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Guard Command uses it, after resolutions a hit character modifies attack -2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: STINKIN' MUTIE!
special_powers.description: If you paid 10 points for Friends of Humanity, when they start the game, choose a starting click. If you paid 5 points for Friends of Humanity -or- they were brought into the game by another effect, instead roll a d6 to determine his starting click: [1] = Click #1; [2] = Click #3; [3] = Click #5; [4] = Click #7; [5] = Click #9; [6] = Click #11. If brought into the game by another effect, their point value is 5.

special_powers.name: STOKING MUTANT HYSTERIA: FEARMONGERING
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Bolivar Trask uses it and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, you may generate a [XDPS] #006 Friends of Humanity. special_powers.name: CREATOR OF THE SENTINEL INITIATIVE
special_powers.description: Support as FREE, but only to target characters with either the Sentinel or Robot keyword.

special_powers.name: ASTRAL SCOUTING MISSION

special_powers.name: MUTANT MESSIAH
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose a friendly character with the Acolytes or Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men keyword. That character can use Mastermind, but only to choose characters with this trait.

special_powers.description: Astral Scanner doesn't block line of fire or require opposing characters to break away. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: LEADER OF THE MORLOCKS

special_powers.name: MERGED FORM
special_powers.description: When Kleinstock Brother starts the game, choose his starting line. Invulnerability and damage +1, but only if Kleinstock Brother is within 3 squares of exactly 1 friendly character named Kleinstock Brother, both with different starting lines. Impervious and damage +2, but only if Kleinstock Brother is within 3 squares of exactly 2 friendly characters named Kleinstock Brother, all with different starting lines.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MESSIAH
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, for all characters with this trait, choose a friendly character with the Acolytes or Brotherhood of Mutants or X-Men keyword. That character can use Mastermind, but only to choose characters with this trait.

special_powers.name: ERIC, THE FLYING ONE
special_powers.description: Sidestep, [Wing Symbol]. Passenger: 2, but only to carry friendly characters named Kleinstock Brother.

special_powers.name: MY MUTANT BROTHERS AND SISTER

special_powers.name: MANIPULATE MORE THAN METAL
special_powers.description: Telekinesis. Once per turn when Magneto uses it, after resolutions roll a d6. [5-6]: Choose one: Remove an action token from a character placed by this Telekinesis -or- He can (immediately) use Telekineis at no cost.

special_powers.name: DANGER ROOM CONSTRUCT
special_powers.description: When Magneto makes an attack, after resolutions give him an Error token for each [1] in the attack roll (maximum 3). // If Magneto has 2 or less Error tokens, characters take a maximum of 1 damage from Magneto's attacks, Magneto takes a maximum of 1 damage from opponent's attacks, and he can't be healed or chosen for Mastermind. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: LESSONS FROM THE DANGER ROOM: MAGNETO
special_powers.description: If Magneto is KO'd by an opposing character, for the rest of the game, that character can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: SIMULATED MASTER OF MAGNETISM
special_powers.description: Force Blast. When Magneto knocks back an opposing character, you may choose the direction of the knock back.

special_powers.name: IN YOUR HEAD
special_powers.description: Super Senses. When an attack targeting Deadpool misses, after resolutions give the attacker an action token.

special_powers.name: CONFUSING APPARITION
special_powers.description: Perplex, but only to negatively modify combat values.

special_powers.description: Running Shot, Force Blast.

special_powers.description: Leadership. When Cyclops use it and succeeds, after resolutions chose another friendly character that shares a keyword and has 0 action tokens. This turn, that character has "FREE: Halve speed, then Move."

special_powers.name: FOUND THE REAL CABLE

special_powers.name: NOTHING LEFT BUT MY HEAD
special_powers.description: STOP. When this power is revealed, place Donald Pierce on this card then generate a "Donald Pierce's Head" object in the square he last occupied. If Donald Pierce is on his card and "Donald Pierce's Head" is KO'd or he's the only character on your force, KO Donald Pierce.

Indestructible. If this object is in Donald Pierce's starting area, adjacent characters can be given a DOUBLE POWER action to place Donald Pierce in this object's square on click #2 and then remove this object from the game.
special_powers.name: EFFECT
HARD TO MOVE, HERO?
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 4 squares modify their attack and damage -2 if they have moved this turn. // Opposing characters can't be placed (from elsewhere on the map) within 4 squares of Harry Leland.

special_powers.name: INNER CIRCLE CLUB: BLACK BISHOP
special_powers.description: Outwit, but only to choose a black power or a special power. // When Harry Leland KO's a higher-point character, after resolutions remove all action tokens from him and heal him 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: INNER CIRCLE CLUB: WHITE QUEEN
special_powers.description: Emma Frost has PROTECTED: Outwit. // Mind Control. When Emma Frost uses it as RANGE, modify attack +1 and she may instead target any number of characters of lower point value. (Must still be opposing and within range and line of fire.)

special_powers.name: MENTAL BLOCKS
special_powers.description: Friendly characters can't be targeted by opposing characters that are more than 6 squares away from them.

special_powers.name: LONG LIVE THE QUEEN
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection, Mastermind.

special_powers.name: INNER CIRCLE CLUB: BLACK QUEEN
special_powers.description: Outwit, but only to choose a black power or a special power. // Mind Control. When Jean Grey uses it as RANGE, modify attack +1 and she may instead target any number of characters of lower point value. (Must still be opposing and within range and line of fire.)

special_powers.name: JASON WYNGARDE HAS SHOWN US THE WAY
special_powers.description: Sidestep. Other friendly characters can target Jean Grey when using Mind Control.

special_powers.name: THE PHOENIX UNBOUND
special_powers.description: STOP. Invulnerability, [Power Cosmic TA], (Wing Symbol). When this click is first revealed, after resolutions deal 3 damage to all other (friendly and opposing) characters within 6 squares.// POWER: Replace Jean Grey with [XTAS] #G020 Dark Phoenix on her purple starting line (that is the replacement's starting line for all game effects).

special_powers.name: DON'T LET THE DREAMS OF ANOTHER LIFE TROUBLE YOU
special_powers.description: Mind Control. When Jason Wyngarde uses it as a range attack, he may count range and draw line of fire from any character he hit this turn and if he hits, after resolutions he can use Mind Control as FREE, but only to target a character he hasn't targeted with Mind Control this turn. If he continues to hit with Mind Control, he may use Mind Control as FREE an additional time.

special_powers.name: PSIONIC ILLUSION
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose a character on your sideline of 150 points or less (on their highest-point line). Generate a bystander printed on that character's card. Each bystander generated this way has [MAX 1]. You may activate this ability only twice per game.

special_powers.name: INNER CIRCLE CLUB: WHITE KING
special_powers.description: Jason Wyngarde has PROTECTED: Outwit. // Leadership, but may remove the action token regardless of adjacency.

special_powers.name: MY CREATION IS YOUR REALITY
special_powers.description: Mastermind, Super Senses.

special_powers.name: INNER CIRCLE CLUB: BLACK KING
special_powers.description: Outwit, but only to choose a black power or a special power. // Leadership, but may remove the action token regardless of adjacency.

special_powers.name: KINETIC ENERGY ABSORBTION
special_powers.description: Sebastian Shaw can't be knocked back.

special_powers.name: THE MORE YOU FIGHT, THE STRONGER I BECOME
special_powers.description: When Sebastian Shaw is hit, give him a number of Energy tokens equal the damage dealt to him by that attack. // FREE: Remove any number of Energy tokens. This turn, Sebastian Shaw can use the effects listed for that number and lower numbers: 1: He has: "FREE: Roll a d6. 5-6: Remove an action token from Sebastian Shaw." 2: Charge 3: Super Strength 4: Flurry 5: Modify all combat values +1 6: Regeneration as FREE.

special_powers.name: LOST IN THE SAVAGE LAND WITH MY RIVAL
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, roll a d6. 1-2: An opponent chooses one of their characters of 75 points or less. 3-6: You choose an opposing character of 75 points or less. If a character is chosen, then place Magneto and the chosen character and 3 Lost tokens on this card. // At the end of your turn, remove a Lost token from this card. When the last Lost token is removed, or if a force has no characters on the map, place Magneto and the chosen character in their starting areas (in squares of your choice).

special_powers.name: SINISTER'S SAVAGE LAND MACHINES
special_powers.description: Earthbound/Neutralized, Sidestep.

special_powers.name: PRIME DIRECTIVE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, Sentinel Squad ONE may move 1 square. If an opposing character with the X-Men or Brotherhood of Mutants keyword is on the map, it may move 1 additional square.

special_powers.name: SENTINEL SQUAD ONE BONDING
special_powers.description: Autopilot. Willpower, but only if Sentinel Squad ONE has a pilot.

special_powers.name: ADVANCED MULTI-TARGETING SYSTEM
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Sentinel Squad ONE uses it and hits an opposing character and that character gets an action token, after resolutions it can use Incapacitate at no cost, but only to target a character Sentinel Squad ONE hasn't targeted with Incapacitate this turn. (It may repeat this.)

special_powers.name: PRIME DIRECTIVE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, Stealth Sentinel may move 1 square. If an opposing character with the X-Men or Brotherhood of Mutants keyword is on the map, it may move 1 additional square.

special_powers.name: POWER ADAPTATION
special_powers.description: Stealth Sentinel can't be healed except by this trait. FREE: Turn it to the same click number of a different color, then heal 1 click. (Stealth Sentinel can't be healed above its starting click number on either dial.)

special_powers.name: STEALTH CAPTURE MODE
special_powers.description: Incapacitate, Poison. Smoke Cloud as FREE.

special_powers.name: EMERGENCY SYSTEMS
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness.

special_powers.name: NIGHT OF THE SENTINELS
special_powers.description: If you paid 33 points for Sentinel, at the beginning of the game choose a starting line. If you paid 25 points for Sentinel -or- it was brought into the game by another effect, roll a d6 to determine it's starting click: 1 = Click #1, 2 = Click #4, 3 = Click #7, 4 = Click #10, 5 = Click #13, 6 = Click #16. If brought into the game by another effect, their point value is 25.

special_powers.name: PRIME DIRECTIVE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, Sentinel may move 1 square. If an opposing character with the X-Men of Brotherhood of Mutants keyword is on the map, it may move 1 additional square.

special_powers.name: CAPTURE COILS
special_powers.description: Plasticity, but affects all opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: KNOCKOUT GAS
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Sentinel makes a close attack, it may instead target all opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire, regardless of adjacency, but must use Incapacitate to give action tokens.

special_powers.name: RECONFIGURING WEAPON SYSTEM FOR MAXIMUM EFFECT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose a standard attack power. Nimrod can use that power this turn.

special_powers.name: RUNNING COMPARATIVE EVALUATION OF REFERENCE DATA
special_powers.description: When Nimrod is attacked and would be hit, you may roll 2d6. If your roll is equal or higher than the attacker's attack roll, Nimrod evades that attack and after resolutions deal the attacker damage equal to their printed damage value.

special_powers.name: REPAIR PROTOCOLS ACTIVATED
special_powers.description: Each time Nimrod takes 2 or more damage from an opponent's attack, give him a Structural Damage token. // FREE: Remove a Structural Damage token to heal 1 click.

special_powers.name: WARPING REALITY
special_powers.description: Barrier, Shape Change, Smoke Cloud. Once per turn, Proteus can use Barrier as FREE or Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers. // Other characters within 3 squares can't use Improved abilities.

special_powers.name: POSSESS SOMEONE TO HIDE
special_powers.description: Mind Control as FREE. When Proteus uses it and hits, you may choose that hit characters can't make attacks. If you do, after resolutions place Proteus adjacent to a hit character and he can't be the target of range attacks until your next turn.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: A PARALYZING FEAR
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Proteus or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Proteus such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character then do so. A hit character gets 2 Fear tokens. Even if this power is lost, characters with Fear tokens must roll a d6 when making an attack, and negatively modify their attack value by half the result, then remove one Fear token.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE: I DON'T KNOW BETTER
special_powers.description: STOP. If Proteus starts on the 20-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: GENOSHAN FORCE FIELD
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose 2, 4, 6, or 8 to be X. // When a character more than X squares away would move within X squares of Exodus and wasn't given a MOVE action, that character stops moving. When a character more than X squares away attacks one or more characters within X squares of Exodus, modify their attack -1.

special_powers.name: MAGNETO'S GREATEST DISCIPLE
special_powers.description: Energy Explosion, Pulse Wave, Telekinesis. Precision Strike, but it can be used with more than one target.

special_powers.name: NAMED BY MAGNUS HIMSELF TO LEAD MUTANTS FORWARD
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Exodus uses it and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, you may remove an action token from up to 3 adjacent friendly characters that each share a keyword (with him). If you do, until your next turn modify Exodus's combat values +1 for each token removed.

special_powers.name: BEHIND THE SCENES
special_powers.description: Onslaught can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: PSYCHIC JUGGERNAUT
special_powers.description: Onslaught has PROTECTED: Mind Control, Outwit, and Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // Once per turn, Onslaught can use Incapacitate as FREE -or- Mind Control as FREE -or- Telekinesis as FREE.

special_powers.name: "KILL YOU, CAIN MARKO? WHAT A SPLENDID IDEA!"
special_powers.description: Onslaught can knock back characters that can use Charge or Combat Reflexes. // When Onslaught hits with a close attack, a hit character unequips all equipment and drops any held objects and after resolutions, Onslaught knocks back a hit character 9 squares.

special_powers.name: RESHAPING REALITY
special_powers.description: Probability Control, Shape Change. When Onslaught uses Probability Control to reroll an opposing character's attack roll and the final result is a miss, after resolutions you may place that opposing character up to 3 squares away from their current square.

special_powers.name: MY MUTANT BROTHERS AND SISTERS
special_powers.description: Once per turn when an effect other than clearing removes an action token from Juggernaut, after resolutions heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: MASS DESTRUCTION:
special_powers.description: Super Strength. When Juggernaut is given a MOVE action, after resolutions destroy all adjacent pieces of blocking terrain, then he can use Quake at no cost.

special_powers.name: CITY-WIDE RAMPAGE
special_powers.description: If Juggernaut destroyed 3 or more pieces of blocking terrain during one of his actions, after resolutions remove an action token from him.

special_powers.name: SHIELDED BY MY HELMET
special_powers.description: Colossal Stamina, Invincible. Juggernaut has PROTECTED: Incapacitate, Mind Control, Outwit, Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: LEAPING SMASH
special_powers.description: Charge. POWER: Place Sasquatch within 5 squares and line of fire. He may then use Quake at no cost.

special_powers.name: WINDS THAT CAN UPEND TANKS
special_powers.description: Force Blast. When Green Dragon Puff moves one or more times during an action, after resolutions she can use Force Blast at no cost.

special_powers.name: BUILDING A NEST OUT OF A SKYSCRAPER
special_powers.description: Sidestep. FREE: Destroy an adjacent piece of blocking terrain. If you do, generate and hold a light object, then make a Range Object attack. Green Dragon Puff may activate this twice per turn.

special_powers.name: REVERT TO ORIGINAL SIZE
special_powers.description: Green Dragon Puff has [Tiny symbol] (instead of Colossal) and can't use her trait.

special_powers.name: COSMIC ENTITY
special_powers.description: Phoenix can't be the target of an attack with more than one target.

special_powers.name: ETERNAL FLAME OF DESTRUCTION AND REBIRTH
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection, Poison. When Phoenix uses Poison and an opposing character took damage from it, after resolutions choose one: heal 1 click for each opposing character damaged this way -or- heal each adjacent friendly character 1 click.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE
special_powers.description: STOP. If Phoenix starts on the 25-point line, she can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: PSIONIC MAELSTROM
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Phoenix or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Phoenix within 3 squares of the chosen character then make a range attack targeting that character and all other opposing characters within 3 squares, regardless of line of fire. Instead of normal damage, deal each hit character 1 penetrating damage for each action token they have. Hit targets that can use Incapacitate, Mind Control, Outwit, or Penetrating/Psychic Blast modify their combat values -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MUTANT DETECTION
special_powers.description: Other friendly characters within 4 squares modify attack +1 and can use Improved Targeting: Hindering when targeting characters with the X-Men or Brotherhood of Mutants keyword.

special_powers.name: TEAM TRANSPORT
special_powers.description: Phasing/Teleport. PASSENGER: 6, but only to carry characters with the X-Men keyword and when she does, don't modify her speed value.

special_powers.name: PRIME DIRECTIVE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, Cyclops Sentinel may move 1 square. If an opposing character with the X-Men or Brotherhood of Mutants keyword is on the map, they may move 1 additional square.

special_powers.name: DECAPITATION IS IRRELEVANT
special_powers.description: Once per game when Cyclops Sentinel takes damage from an opponent's attack, after resolutions generate a Sentinel Head bystander and Cyclops Sentinel can't make range attacks for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: ENORMOUS OPTIC BEAM
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // When Cyclops Sentinel hits with a range attack, after resolutions choose one to affect a hit character and all opposing characters adjacent to it: Deal them each 1 penetrating damage -or- Give them each an action token -or- Knock them each back 6 squares.

special_powers.name: SCOTT IS INDESTRUCTIBLE
special_powers.description: If XDPS G012 Cyclops Sentinel is on the map, this character can't be KO'd except by a critical hit. // Sentinel Head can't be chosen for Mastermind.

special_powers.name: IT IS MY RESOLUTE BELIEF THAT X-51 IS BETTER SUITED FOR THE ROLE OF EXECUTIONER... YOUR EXECUTIONER!
special_powers.description: Mind Control, but only to target friendly or opposing characters with the Robot keyword.

special_powers.name: THE MUTANT ERADICATION BEGINS
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Bastion uses it and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, you may generate a [XDPS] #G002 Sentinel (when generating the Sentinel, roll for it's trait to determine it's starting click). // If an opposing character has the X-Men or Brotherhood of Mutants keyword, Bastion succeeds on a result of 4-6 when using Leadership.

special_powers.name: AUTOMATED FORCE-FIELDS
special_powers.description: Impervious. Barrier as FREE but only to generate the markers in squares adjacent to Bastion. Those markers block lines of fire drawn to characters that can use Great Size. (He may still target through them.)

special_powers.name: THE GARDEN OF PROTEUS
special_powers.description: Once per action for all characters with this trait, whenever a standard character within range is given a costed action, after resolutions you may generate a blocking, hindering, or water terrain marker within 3 squares of that character but not in their square. At the beginning of your next turn, remove all terrain markers generated by Proteus.

special_powers.name: YOU'RE NOT HURTING HIM, YOU ARE FEEDING HIM
special_powers.description: When Proteus is missed by a range attack, after resolutions heal him 1 click. Proteus can heal past his starting lines in this way but can't be healed any other way.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: AH WELL, I TRIED...
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Proteus or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Proteus such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character then do so also targeting all other opposing characters within 3 squares and line of fire. Hit characters gain Immobile until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SNAP BACK INTO FOCUS
special_powers.description: STOP. Super Senses.

special_powers.name: THE FORCE OF MAGNETISM IS AT MY COMMAND
special_powers.description: Leadership. FREE: Choose a character within range and line of fire. Place that character in a square adjacent to its current square.

special_powers.name: MANKIND'S DESTRUCTION IS AT HAND
special_powers.description: Pulse Wave, Telekinesis. When Magneto uses Pulse Wave, he can use Improved Targeting: Blocking. After resolutions, destroy all blocking terrain within that use of Pulse Wave's range and, if two or more pieces of blocking terrain are destroyed in this way, generate an object. // FREE: Choose an unheld object within 6 squares and line of fire. If you do, pick up and hold that object then give Magneto a RANGE Object Action as FREE.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC SHIELDING
special_powers.description: Magneto has PROTECTED: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. Impervious. When Magneto is attacked, modify defense +1 for every 2 squares the attacker is away from him.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: MASTER OF MAGNETISM
special_powers.description: FREE: If no other friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Magneto or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Magneto such that he can make a range attack targeting the chosen character then do so.

special_powers.name: SENTINELS
special_powers.description: FREE: If an opponent's force has more characters than your force does, generate a Sentinel bystander: [MAX 3] at 600 points; [MAX 2] at 300 points; [MAX 1] at 150 points.

special_powers.name: BEHIND THE SCENES
special_powers.description: Red Onslaught can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: WORLD WAR HATE
special_powers.description: Mind Control, Sidestep. When Red Onslaught uses Mind Control targeting a single opposing character and hits, for the rest of the game that character does not have any keywords and can't use team abilities.

special_powers.name: OMEGA-LEVEL
special_powers.description: Mastermind, Leadership, Outwit. When Red Onslaught uses Leadership and succeeds, you may also choose an opposing character within range and a standard power. Give the chosen character an action token and that character can't use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: THE GIRLS ARE GOING TO GO NUTS
special_powers.description: Eugene Torbit Witterspan doesn't count against theme teams.

special_powers.name: JUGGERNAUT SLAM-DANCING
special_powers.description: Super Strength, Quake. When Eugene Torbit Witterspan uses Quake and hits, until your next turn hit characters can't be given actions except MOVE actions.

special_powers.name: FLYING DEBRIS
special_powers.description: When Colossus uses Charge, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to each opposing character that's adjacent to one or more debris markers he created this turn.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: NOW, YOU FACE WRATH
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Colossus or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. If that character is within the same row or column as Colossus, place Colossus adjacent to that character and make a close combat attack targeting all characters in the rows or columns between where Colossus began this action and his current square, regardless of adjacency. Hit characters are each dealt 2 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: SMELL OF FLESH
special_powers.description: Sidestep, but only if a character has a Wounded token. When an opposing character takes damage from an attack, give that character a Wounded token if they don't have one. When a character heals, remove their Wounded tokens.

special_powers.name: ANCIENT MYSTICAL CURSE
special_powers.description: Colossal Stamina, Steal Energy. When Wendigo uses Steal Energy, he may heal past his starting line.

special_powers.name: IN THE MOUNTAINS, NO ONE HEARS YOU SCREAM
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry. When Wendigo ends his movement, after resolutions he may make a close attack but only to target a character with a Wounded token.

special_powers.name: YOU CANNOT ESCAPE THE WENDIGO
special_powers.description: STOP. Invulnerability. If no opposing character has a Wounded token, do not stop turning the dial due to STOP.

special_powers.name: DRACONIC METAMORPH
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, you may turn Vange Whedon to click #25. (Her starting click doesn't change.)

special_powers.name: DISTRACT THEM WITH THE CLAWS, HIT THEM WITH THE TAIL
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Vange Whedon makes a close attack and hits, after resolutions deal 1 damage and give an action token to another opposing character within 2 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: HUMAN UNTIL SPLASHED BY BLOOD...
special_powers.description: Vange Whedon is [Standard symbol] instead of [Colossal symbol]. When Vange Whedon or an adjacent friendly character would take damage, they don't take that damage and instead turn Vange Whedon to her starting click. Protected: Pulse Wave, Outwit.

special_powers.name: FEEDING ON LIFE FORCES
special_powers.description: When Dark Phoenix KO's an opposing character, or an opposing character takes 4 or more damage from her attack, after resolutions heal her 1 click. She may heal past her starting lines this way but can't be healed in any other way.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: CHILD OF LIGHT AND DARKNESS
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Dark Phoenix or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Dark Phoenix such that she can make a close attack targeting the chosen character then do so also targeting all other characters (friendly or opposing) within 3 squares. Hit characters are given an action token and each dealt 2 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: SPECKS OF DUST TO ME
special_powers.description: STOP. Impervious.

special_powers.name: THE FLORA NEEDS TO FEED
special_powers.description: Steal Energy. Opposing characters that occupy or are adjacent to its hindering terrain markers must break away as if breaking away from Krakoa, and it may target them with a close attack regardless of adjacency.

special_powers.name: ENTANGLING VINES
special_powers.description: Flurry, Phasing/Teleport, Plasticity.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: THE LIVING LAND
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Krakoa or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Krakoa such that it can make a close attack targeting the chosen character then do so using Quake at no cost. If you did, after resolutions generate hindering terrain markers in all squares Krakoa occupied at the beginning and end of this action.

special_powers.name: BEHIND THE SCENES
special_powers.description: Mojo can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: MORE ACTION!...RATINGS ARE DROPPING!
special_powers.description: Whenever a character misses all targets of their attack, give Mojo a Bored token. // FREE: Remove 2 Bored tokens to either place Mojo anywhere on the map -or- make an attack.

special_powers.name: KEEP THE CAMERAS ON THEM!
special_powers.description: Sidestep. When an opposing characters uses Sidestep, after resolutions Mojo may move up to 2 squares.

special_powers.name: A BEING OF THE ASTRAL PLANE
special_powers.description: Shadow King can reduce penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: BEHIND THE SCENES
special_powers.description: Shadow King can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: YOU BELONG TO THE SHADOW KING NOW
special_powers.description: Mind Control, Phasing/Teleport. Once per turn, when Shadow King uses either, after resolutions he may use the other one at no cost.

special_powers.name: A BEING OF PURE PSYCHIC DESTRUCTION
special_powers.description: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When Shadow King KO's a character, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to each opposing character that was adjacent to that character.

special_powers.name: SUMMON A VORTEX OF WIND
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection. // FREE: Choose up to 3 opposing characters within 6 squares and line of fire, then roll a d6. Knock back each of the chosen characters a number of squares equal to the result.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: MIND WARP
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Storm or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Storm such that she can make a close attack targeting the chosen character then do so. If she hit, after resolutions she can use Mind Control at no cost as RANGE, modifying attack +3, to target the hit character and up to two others (within range and line of fire).

special_powers.name: THIS NEW HOST PLEASES ME, I WOULDN'T WANT TO LOSE IT
special_powers.description: STOP.

special_powers.name: I CAN'T SEE THE BOTTOM OF THE PILE YET
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate a number of Madrox Dupe bystanders corresponding to his point value: 400=4, 300=3, 200=2, 100=1. If Madrox would be KO'd while adjacent to a Madrox Dupe, instead KO one of those bystanders and turn him to click #22.

special_powers.name: THE ORIGINAL MULTIPLE MAN
special_powers.description: When Madrox is hit by an attack or hits with a close attack, after resolutions generate a Madrox Dupe bystander. (Using Flurry may generate 2 bystanders in a turn.)

special_powers.name: THE COPIES HAVE BEEN LEARNING ON THEIR OWN
special_powers.description: Madrox and his Madrox Dupes can use the standard attack and damage powers that opposing characters adjacent to them can use. (They lose the power as soon as the opposing character is no longer adjacent.)

special_powers.name: ARGH! STOP MAKING NEW LAYERS!
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When he uses it, on a result of 5 generate a Madrox Dupe bystander, and on a result of 6 generate two Madrox Dupe bystanders. Protected: Outwit.

special_powers.name: CHILL, IT'S JUST A GIANT ICE SWORD
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Iceman KO's a [Giant symbol] or [Colossal symbol] character, after resolutions he can use Charge at no cost, but may only attack a character with [Giant symbol] or [Colossal symbol]. (He may repeat this.)

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL INDIFFERENCE: ICE ROBOT!
special_powers.description: STOP. If Iceman started the game on the 15-point starting line, he can't attack smaller characters except via Colossal Retaliation.

special_powers.name: COLOSSAL RETALIATION: GLACIER FISTS
special_powers.description: FREE: If no friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Iceman or damaged a friendly character since your last turn. Place Iceman such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character then do so. If he did, after resolutions he can immediately use Incapacitate at no cost, but may target smaller characters.
